verb.description: To make the sound achoo; to sneeze.

exclamation.description: Representing the sound of a sneeze.

noun.description: An exclamation of achoo; a sneeze.

origin: Late 19th century; earliest use found in The Chicago Daily News. From achoo<br>mid 19th century; earliest use found in Lloyd's Penny Weekly Miscellany. Imitative of the sound made when sneezing.
